content: Update Prisma schema to add Task, TaskAssignment, and points-related models with proper relationships and constraints
Generate and run database migration for the new task management schema
Add Joi validation schemas for task creation, assignment, and completion endpoints
Implement task management API routes (POST /api/tasks, GET /api/tasks, GET /api/tasks/:id, PATCH /api/tasks/:id, DELETE /api/tasks/:id, POST /api/tasks/:id/assign)
Implement task completion workflow API routes (PATCH /api/tasks/:id/complete, PATCH /api/tasks/:id/verify)
Implement points system API routes (GET /api/users/:id/points, GET /api/points/transactions)
Write comprehensive backend tests for task management, completion workflow, and points system
Update frontend API client with task management endpoints
Create frontend UI components (TaskCard, TaskForm, TaskList, TaskCompletion, TaskVerification)
Create frontend pages for task management (Tasks, CreateTask, TaskDetails)
Add points display to user profile and dashboard components
Write frontend component and integration tests for task management features
Update App.tsx routing to include new task management pages
